history.proof: split. - intros H. split. + apply filter_In in H. destruct H as [HA _]. auto. + apply filter_In in H. destruct H as [_ Hpx]. auto. - intros [HA Hpx]. apply filter_In. split. + auto. + auto.

original: intros X x p A. split. - intros H. split. + apply filter_In in H. destruct H as [HA _]. auto. + apply filter_In in H. destruct H as [_ Hpx]. auto. - intros [HA Hpx]. apply filter_In. split. + auto. + auto.
